General.Name: Qilu Bank Co Ltd
General.Description: QILU BANK CO., LTD. provides personal and corporate banking services in the People's Republic of China. The company offers personal savings products, including deposits and withdrawals; personal demand, savings, and education savings deposits; personal, housing mortgage, consumer credit, home and home improvement, parking, salary, and other loans; wealth management services; credit cards; and insurance products. It also provides corporate deposits; and corporate financing; supply chain financing; cash management; and investment banking products and services. In addition, the company offers international banking products and services, such as foreign exchange funds, accounts, deposits, and guarantees; trade financing; remittance route; international settlement services; commercial acceptance bills bonding/guarantee services; and Internet banking services. Further, it is involved in bills discounting and execution, interbank lending and investment, bond investment and spot bond trading, and foreign exchange and derivatives trading activities. The company was formerly known as Jinan City Commercial Bank Co., Ltd and changed its name to QILU BANK CO., LTD. in June 2009. The company was founded in 1996 and is based in Jinan, the People's Republic of China.
